verses.verse: And when king <S%H4428><s%> Arad <S%H6166><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> which dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the south, <S%H5045><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> tell that Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the spies; <S%H871><s%> then he fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> some of them prisoners. <S%H7628><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you will indeed <S%H389><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> into my hand, <S%H3027><s%> then I will utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> their cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> up the Canaanites; <S%H3669><s%> and they utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them and their cities: <S%H5892><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> to compass <S%H5437><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom: <S%H123><s%> and the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> was much <S%H7114><s%> discouraged <S%H7114><s%> because of the way. <S%H1870><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> against God, <S%H430><s%> and against Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> have you brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness? <S%H4057><s%> for there is no <S%H369><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> is there any water; <S%H4325><s%> and our soul <S%H5315><s%> loathes <S%H6973><s%> this light <S%H7052><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents <S%H5175><s%> among the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they bit <S%H5391><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> and much <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%>

Therefore the people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> We have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> for we have spoken <S%H1696><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and against you; pray <S%H6419><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that he take <S%H5493><s%> away the serpents <S%H5175><s%> from us. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> for the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Make <S%H6213><s%> you a fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpent, <S%H8314><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> it on a pole: <S%H5251><s%> and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that every <S%H3605><s%> one that is bitten, <S%H5391><s%> when he looks <S%H7200><s%> on it, shall live. <S%H2425><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> a serpent <S%H5175><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it on a pole, <S%H5251><s%> and it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that if <S%H518><s%> a serpent <S%H5175><s%> had bitten <S%H5391><s%> any man, <S%H376><s%> when he beheld <S%H5027><s%> the serpent <S%H5175><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> he lived. <S%H2425><s%>
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> forward, <S%H5265><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Oboth. <S%H88><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Oboth, <S%H88><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Ijeabarim, <S%H5863><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Moab, <S%H4124><s%> toward the sun rise. <S%H4217><s%>
From there <S%H8033><s%> they removed, <S%H5265><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Zared. <S%H2218><s%>

From there <S%H8033><s%> they removed, <S%H5265><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the other <S%H5676><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> of Arnon, <S%H769><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> that comes <S%H3318><s%> out of the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites: <S%H567><s%> for Arnon <S%H769><s%> is the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> and the Amorites. <S%H567><s%>

Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> it is said <S%H559><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the wars <S%H4421><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> What <S%H853><s%> he did <S%H2052><s%> in the Red <S%H5492><s%> sea, and in the brooks <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon, <S%H769><s%>

And at the stream <S%H793><s%> of the brooks <S%H5158><s%> that goes <S%H5186><s%> down <S%H5186><s%> to the dwelling <S%H3427><s%> of Ar, <S%H6144><s%> and lies <S%H8172><s%> on the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

And from there <S%H8033><s%> they went to Beer: <S%H876><s%> that is the well <S%H875><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Gather <S%H622><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them water. <S%H4325><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> sang <S%H7891><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> Spring <S%H5927><s%> up, O well; <S%H875><s%> sing <S%H6030><s%> you to it:

The princes <S%H8269><s%> dig <S%H2658><s%> the well, <S%H875><s%> the nobles <S%H5081><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> dig <S%H3738><s%> it, by the direction of the lawgiver, <S%H2710><s%> with their staves. <S%H4938><s%> And from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> they went to Mattanah: <S%H4980><s%>
And from Mattanah <S%H4980><s%> to Nahaliel: <S%H5160><s%> and from Nahaliel <S%H5160><s%> to Bamoth: <S%H1120><s%>

And from Bamoth <S%H1120><s%> in the valley, <S%H1516><s%> that is in the country <S%H7704><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> which looks <S%H8259><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jeshimon. <S%H3452><s%>
And Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land: <S%H776><s%> we will not turn <S%H5186><s%> into the fields, <S%H7704><s%> or into the vineyards; <S%H3754><s%> we will not drink <S%H8354><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the well: <S%H875><s%> but we will go <S%H3212><s%> along by the king's <S%H4428><s%> high way, <S%H1870><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> we be past <S%H5674><s%> your borders. <S%H1366><s%>

And Sihon <S%H5511><s%> would not suffer <S%H5414><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through his border: <S%H1366><s%> but Sihon <S%H5511><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> together, and went <S%H3318><s%> out against Israel <S%H3478><s%> into the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> and he came <S%H935><s%> to Jahaz, <S%H3096><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> him with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> his land <S%H776><s%> from Arnon <S%H769><s%> to Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> even to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon: <S%H5983><s%> for the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> was strong. <S%H5794><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof.

For Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> was the city <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> had fought <S%H3898><s%> against the former <S%H7223><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and taken <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his land <S%H776><s%> out of his hand, <S%H3027><s%> even to Arnon. <S%H769><s%>

Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they that speak in proverbs <S%H4911><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> into Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> let the city <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> be built <S%H1129><s%> and prepared: <S%H3559><s%>

For there is a fire <S%H784><s%> gone <S%H3318><s%> out of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> a flame <S%H3852><s%> from the city <S%H7151><s%> of Sihon: <S%H5511><s%> it has consumed <S%H398><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and the lords <S%H1167><s%> of the high <S%H1116><s%> places of Arnon. <S%H769><s%>

Woe <S%H188><s%> to you, Moab! <S%H4124><s%> you are undone, <S%H6><s%> O people <S%H5971><s%> of Chemosh: <S%H3645><s%> he has given <S%H5414><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> that escaped, <S%H6412><s%> and his daughters, <S%H1323><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites. <S%H567><s%>

We have shot <S%H3384><s%> at them; Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> is perished <S%H6><s%> even to Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> and we have laid them waste <S%H8074><s%> even to Nophah, <S%H5302><s%> which <S%H834><s%> reaches to Medeba. <S%H4311><s%>
Thus Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites. <S%H567><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy <S%H7270><s%> out Jaazer, <S%H3270><s%> and they took <S%H3920><s%> the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof, and drove <S%H3423><s%> out the Amorites <S%H567><s%> that were there. <S%H8033><s%>

And they turned <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up by the way <S%H1870><s%> of Bashan: <S%H1316><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> them, he, and all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%> at Edrei. <S%H154><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> him not: for I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> him into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> and his land; <S%H776><s%> and you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to him as you did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> at Heshbon. <S%H2809><s%>

So they smote <S%H5221><s%> him, and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> there was none <S%H1115><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> him alive: <S%H8300><s%> and they possessed <S%H3423><s%> his land. <S%H776><s%>
